channel.title: Methods for walking?
channel.description: Well I decided to start working on client developing, and I remember last time I tried I found it insane to do, but after 4 months of server coding I know a bit more java so I've decided to make a basic scriptable bot for private servers (just for walking etc., I'm against cheating on private servers unless it's one I hate =P, also my friend can spawn npcs and items on any server and get insane amounts of xp sort of like what autorune was like, I'm gonna try and do something like that for testing when I'm alot better), but anyway, I need the methods for walking, so I can choose where the bot walks etc., if anyone can post where abouts in the deob (317 I'm using btw) then I'd appreciate it alot, thanks.

item.title: Methods for walking?
item.dc:creator: @pplsuqbawlz pplsuqbawlz
item.description:
@pplsuqbawlz wrote:

Nay you cannot use any client… There’s been major coding modifications between 317-322, from 322-328, from 328-354, from 354-364, and finally from 364 to present. But you wouldn’t know that becauseeee? Oh yeah, like you said, you are a noooob.

Read full topic

item.title: Methods for walking?
item.dc:creator: @xerozcheez xerozcheez
item.description:
@xerozcheez wrote:

Oh yeah I am using 317 lol, but actually I could use any deob if I edited the magic id in the client or what the id has to be in the server =P so yeah my mistake it’s 317, I’m having alot of trouble with this anyway because for aryan it’s like current tile = rs.x and then public static bot rs so i go into bot to find x = something from another class -.-

Read full topic

item.title: Methods for walking?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

your not using the 366 deob, your using the 317 deob (or you will have to if you want it to connect to private servers ;))

Read full topic
